description.p: Automatically generated OSCAL SSP from OpenControl guidance for Red Hat OpenShift Dedicated
This item is useless nevertheless required.
A holistic, top-level explanation of the FedRAMP authorization boundary.
FedRAMP SSP Template Section 13
'AC-1(a) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'
'AC-1(b) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'
'AC-2(a) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'
'AC-2(b) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'

'AC-2(h) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'

'AC-2(j) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'
'AC-2(k) is an organizational control outside the scope of component-level configuration.'

A control response is planned. Progress can be tracked via:
[https://github.com/ComplianceAsCode/redhat/issues/762](https://github.com/ComplianceAsCode/redhat/issues/762)

OpenShift Dedicated staff do not have physical access to the facility where the information system resides.
This control is inherited from Amazon Web Services.
